name: Kobold Menace
dialogue: Those kobolds are obsessed with their candles. If we take enough of them, maybe they'll get the message and leave. Bring me 8 Kobold Candles. You can find them on the kobolds to the west.
completionDialogue: Excellent work! These candles will serve as proof of your combat readiness. You're shaping up to be a fine warrior. Continue training and taking on challenges.
